name: XppCreateSourceModelPackage
description: Task to create a model source package for Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations
author: Renaud Paquay

inputs.name: XppToolsPath
inputs.label: X++ Tools Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: On a VM this will be the bin folder in the PackagesLocalDirectory, on hosted agents this should be the path where the compiler NuGet was installed

inputs.name: XppMetadataPath
inputs.label: Location of the X++ Metadata
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the X++ Metadata used to generate the model files that should be packaged, or the default path for the search pattern

inputs.name: XppMetadataSearch
inputs.label: Search pattern for Models to package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional search pattern for the packages to include from the metadata location. Wildcards can be used, or a list of packages by specifying one package name per line.

inputs.name: SourceModelPackagePath
inputs.label: Filename and path for the source model package to create
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path including filename for the new source model package
